1.0.name: wordpress/tinyslider
1.0.description:
• Create a simple slide show by jquery.
  • Thanks wex and Michael to write jQuery functions.

Features:

  • 4 Slide Image.
  • Link and title on the slide.
  • Slide buttons Management.
  • Customize the height and width of slides
  • Easy installation.
  • Settings for editing images

Langusgaes:

  • Persian
  • English Mostafa Soufi
